Title: Blacksmithing Services Requested
Description:
Greetings, $c. The Artisan's Consortium is looking for highly skilled artisans to complete orders for local clientele. 

If you think your work is up to the standards and quality we expect, please take a at shot at filling out some of our public orders. You can also fill orders for patrons of your own, guild orders, or personal orders. 

Come speak with me once you've completed your designs, and may the wind guide your hands and heart.
ObjectivesText: Fill Blacksmithing Crafting Orders for the Artisan's Consortium.
